meaningMnemonic: Pointing a <radical>thread</radical> to the <radical>east</radical> is what you <kanji>practice</kanji> every day. You're incredibly passionate about eastward thread-pointing, so you make sure to practice every day.
readingMnemonic: You do all of this <kanji>practice</kanji> to try and afford all of your <reading>ren</reading>tals (れん). One day, all of this practice will pay for all of your rentals.
